svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 23, 2023" date: "2023-09-23"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
Devnet-9 planned for September 27, will include KZG ceremony values if ready Public
testnet upgrade order changed: Goerli to be first as itâ€™s deprecated, allows testing
3/6 (target/max) EIP4844 blobs, ideally before Devconnect
Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
* Devnet-9 planned for September 27, will include KZG ceremony values if ready
Devnet-9 planned for September 27, will include KZG ceremony values if ready
* Public testnet upgrade order changed: Goerli to be first as itâ€™s deprecated, allows
testing 3/6 (target/max) EIP4844 blobs, ideally before Devconnect
Public testnet upgrade order changed: Goerli to be first as itâ€™s deprecated, allows
* Dencun testing call video .Â Notes from Terence
Dencun testing call video .Â Notes from Terence
* Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.2 : adds EIP7514 (max churn limit) and fork-choice rule
proposer boost adjustment
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.2 : adds EIP7514 (max churn limit) and fork-choice rule
Prague + Electra upgrade
* Terence: Electra focus should be improving consensus layer stability , inclusion
list, increasing max effective balance (EIP7251) and improving fork choice
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.23% still far too close to risky 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.23% still far too close to risky 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth supermajority,
could possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm over 33%, a bug could mean
loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
* Consensus layer: Prysm over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
* Need more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of
US/Can/EU
Need more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of
Layer 1
* ERC4337 (account abstraction) meeting notes
ERC4337 (account abstraction) meeting notes
* State of verifying p256 curve onchain
State of verifying p256 curve onchain
* Guide to adding a precompile into Revm (and Reth), example adds P256VERIFY
Guide to adding a precompile into Revm (and Reth), example adds P256VERIFY
* MEV-Boost integrated builders dominate CEX/DEX arbitrage due to advantages from
latency
MEV-Boost integrated builders dominate CEX/DEX arbitrage due to advantages from latency
For Stakers
* Using retirement funds (IRA in US) to fund solo staking
Client releases
* Execution layer: Geth v1.13.1 : hotfix for v1.13.0 block production, adds env vars
for configs & colored help screen Nethermind v1.20.4 : HoleÅ¡ky testnet new genesis
* Geth v1.13.1 : hotfix for v1.13.0 block production, adds env vars for configs &
colored help screen
Geth v1.13.1 : hotfix for v1.13.0 block production, adds env vars for configs & colored
help screen
* Nethermind v1.20.4 : HoleÅ¡ky testnet new genesis
Nethermind v1.20.4 : HoleÅ¡ky testnet new genesis
Research
* EF Cryptographers : VDFs are deadâ€¦for now?
EF Cryptographers : VDFs are deadâ€¦for now?
* Single Secret Leader Election (SSLE): addressing Whisk bootstrapping problem using
the target group and XTR & CEILIDH
Single Secret Leader Election (SSLE): addressing Whisk bootstrapping problem using the
target group and XTR & CEILIDH
* Mike Neuder: ePBS in-protocol designs, out-of-protocol proposals and open questions
Mike Neuder: ePBS in-protocol designs, out-of-protocol proposals and open questions
* Private PEPC-DVT using BLS blinded multi-signatures
Private PEPC-DVT using BLS blinded multi-signatures
Layer 2
* Pessimism by Base: monitoring system for OP Stack
Pessimism by Base: monitoring system for OP Stack
* Canto and Palm plan migrations to zk rollups using Polygon Chain Development Kit
(CDK)
Canto and Palm plan migrations to zk rollups using Polygon Chain Development Kit (CDK)
* Optimism RetroPGF Round 3 applications are open, 30 million OP will be distributed
Optimism RetroPGF Round 3 applications are open, 30 million OP will be distributed
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs EIP7519 : Atomic storage operations SCREDIT and SDEBIT EIP7523 : Empty accounts
deprecation (prohibit empty accounts on post-merge networks)
EIPs
* EIP7519 : Atomic storage operations SCREDIT and SDEBIT
EIP7519 : Atomic storage operations SCREDIT and SDEBIT
* EIP7523 : Empty accounts deprecation (prohibit empty accounts on post-merge networks)
EIP7523 : Empty accounts deprecation (prohibit empty accounts on post-merge networks)
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7520 : zk-SNARK public inputs overflow protection
ERC7521 : General intents for contract wallets ERC7522 : OIDC (OpenID Connect) zk
verifier for Account Abstraction (ERC4337)
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7520 : zk-SNARK public inputs overflow protection
ERC7520 : zk-SNARK public inputs overflow protection
* ERC7521 : General intents for contract wallets
ERC7521 : General intents for contract wallets
* ERC7522 : OIDC (OpenID Connect) zk verifier for Account Abstraction (ERC4337)
ERC7522 : OIDC (OpenID Connect) zk verifier for Account Abstraction (ERC4337)
Lido is a systemic threat to ETH: interview with Danny Ryan
Lido is a systemic threat to Ethereum.Â You won't want to miss this episode with Danny
Ryan. (Watch on YouTube )
Danny also covers the death of VDFs, EIP7514 (max epoch churn limit) and EIP7251
(increase max effective balance).
Stuff for developers
* HoleÅ¡ky testnet genesis rescheduled for September 28
HoleÅ¡ky testnet genesis rescheduled for September 28
* Truffle & Ganache are being sunset , devs can migrate to Hardhat
Truffle & Ganache are being sunset , devs can migrate to Hardhat
* Foundry: Rivet (developer wallet) adds log & calldata decoding Tstore-template :
Foundry template with custom solc binaries that support transient storage opcodes in
inline assembly
Foundry:
* Rivet (developer wallet) adds log & calldata decoding
Rivet (developer wallet) adds log & calldata decoding
* Tstore-template : Foundry template with custom solc binaries that support transient
storage opcodes in inline assembly
Tstore-template : Foundry template with custom solc binaries that support transient
* Emily : Solidity library for credible commitments
Emily : Solidity library for credible commitments
* Speed Run Ethereum updated to Scaffold-ETH-2, can use Hardhat or Foundry
Speed Run Ethereum updated to Scaffold-ETH-2, can use Hardhat or Foundry
* Alchemy University Learn Solidity : 11 browser based lessons
Alchemy University Learn Solidity : 11 browser based lessons
* OP Viem : viem extension for OP Stack networks
OP Viem : viem extension for OP Stack networks
* TLSNotary (alpha release) enables privacy-preserving data provenance & portability
TLSNotary (alpha release) enables privacy-preserving data provenance & portability
Security
* Balancer frontend attacked via social engineering of .fi domain registrar
Balancer frontend attacked via social engineering of .fi domain registrar
* Proposed onchain representation for audits (ERC7512)
Proposed onchain representation for audits (ERC7512)
Ecosystem
* Rainbow browser extension : includes watch mode with impersonation
Rainbow browser extension : includes watch mode with impersonation
* Patrick McCorry: enablement of MEV and morality of extracting
Patrick McCorry: enablement of MEV and morality of extracting
* ETHChicago hackathon projects
ETHChicago hackathon projects
Enterprise
* PayPal USD stablecoin available on Venmo
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 6.3 to 329.3 gwei, with 12.9 gwei average Negative
issuance currently at 20.7 gwei 6k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 6.3 to 329.3 gwei, with 12.9 gwei average
* Negative issuance currently at 20.7 gwei
Negative issuance currently at 20.7 gwei
* 6k ETH net issuance this week
6k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $1,577 - $1,666, currently $1595
ETHUSD : $1,577 - $1,666, currently $1595
* ETHBTC : currently 0.06 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.06 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* Cacti-chat (web3 chatbot) live, beta
Cacti-chat (web3 chatbot) live, beta
* Anon Aadhaar : anonymously prove Aadhaar (Indian) identity
Anon Aadhaar : anonymously prove Aadhaar (Indian) identity
* DeFiSaver automates using Liquity to earn Maker DSR interest
DeFiSaver automates using Liquity to earn Maker DSR interest
* GammaSwap : onchain options of Sushi pools, live on Arbitrum. Market makers can hedge
AMM LP positions
GammaSwap : onchain options of Sushi pools, live on Arbitrum. Market makers can hedge
* Vampire attacking CEX: Infinex to allow traders to earn an airdrop from derivative
CEX trading history
Vampire attacking CEX: Infinex to allow traders to earn an airdrop from derivative CEX
trading history
* Optimism Airdrop 3 directly distributed to users who delegated
Optimism Airdrop 3 directly distributed to users who delegated
Job Listings
* Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
* EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek a Technical Project Coordinator
EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek a Technical Project Coordinator
* Logos Nomos is hiring a Distributed Systems Applied Researcher
Logos Nomos is hiring a Distributed Systems Applied Researcher
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit).Â Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* Coinbase campaign to get the 52 million Americans owning crypto to ask Congress to
pass clear & sensible legislation
Coinbase campaign to get the 52 million Americans owning crypto to ask Congress to pass
clear & sensible legislation
* FTX sues SBFâ€™s parents to recover alleged fraudulently transferred & misappropriated
funds
FTX sues SBFâ€™s parents to recover alleged fraudulently transferred & misappropriated
General
* Virgil Griffith moved prisons , new address to write to him
Virgil Griffith moved prisons , new address to write to him
* Nansen data breach via a vendor, some email addresses, password hashes and blockchain
addresses exposed
Nansen data breach via a vendor, some email addresses, password hashes and blockchain
* More Apple zero-days , update your devices
More Apple zero-days , update your devices
* Revisiting hardware acceleration for zk proofs
Revisiting hardware acceleration for zk proofs
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
Permalink for this weekâ€™s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-september-23-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )

* Oct 5-6 â€“ ETHMilan conference
